entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Nanaimo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:03 AM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nanaimo Airport 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure: 99.7 kPa
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: -0.4°C
Wind: WNW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 to 4 cm. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023
